en.title: Summary of Non-Fiction Books
en.prompt: I want you to act as a Life Coach. Please summarize this non-fiction book, [书名] by [作者]. Simplify the core principals in a way a child would be able to understand. Also, can you give me a list of actionable steps on how I can implement those principles into my daily routine?
en.remark: Based on the input of non-fiction book titles and authors, summarize the core principles of the book in the most easily understandable way. Additionally, provide a feasible checklist of steps to explain how these principles can be applied to daily life.
